['', 'Migrate existing data processing from standalone or legacy technology scripts to GCP', 'Should have experience working with gigabytes/terabytes of data and must understand the challenges of transforming and enriching such large datasets.', 'Bachelors in Computer Science (or equivalent)', 'Design and develop data pipelines utilizing GCP or Spark/HadoopMigrate existing data processing from standalone or legacy technology scripts to GCPShould have experience working with gigabytes/terabytes of data and must understand the challenges of transforming and enriching such large datasets.', 'Your primary role will be to design and build data pipelines on Google Cloud Platform. You will be focused on designing and implementing solutions on Hadoop, Spark, Pig, Hive.\xa0In this role you will be exposed to Google Cloud Platform including Dataflow, BigQuery and Kubernetes so the ideal candidate will have a strong big data technology foundation and bring a passion to learn new technologies.\xa0If you believe you have these skills please email your resume to info@springml.com.', 'Required Skills:', '4-7 years Python and Java programming3-5 years Hadoop, Big Data ecosystem experienceFamiliarity with Devops, Kubernetes, DockerBachelors in Computer Science (or equivalent)', 'Duties and Responsibilities:', '3-5 years Hadoop, Big Data ecosystem experience', 'At SpringML, we are all about empowering the ‘doers’ in companies to make smarter decisions with their data. Our predictive analytics products and solutions apply machine learning to today’s most pressing business problems so customers get insights they can trust to drive business growth.\xa0We are a tight knit, friendly team of passionate and driven people who are dedicated to learning, get excited to solve tough problems and like seeing results, fast.', 'Design and develop data pipelines utilizing GCP or Spark/Hadoop', 'Familiarity with Devops, Kubernetes, Docker', '4-7 years Python and Java programming']

['', 'Design and implement data models (MDM hub and staging marts), ETL processes, and integration pipelines.Build cross functional relationships with data analytic teams and business leaders to understand information needs, data flows, and data quality considerations to enable solution deployment.Utilize data quality techniques for data validation, unit testing, and automated integration testing. Implement frameworks for automated and scripted testing.Contribute to improving solution stability, reliability, efficiency, and quality.Work with architects to implement solutions in alignment with standards.Test new software products/updates; working with other members of the Master Data Management team and business partners to improve usability and recommend improvements.Identify technical solutions that achieve efficiency and effectiveness and enable data usage as a strategic, business asset.', 'Strong SQL experience, writing queries and stored procedures.', 'Experience with database management systems including performance optimizing and tuning. ', 'Development experience with Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services.', 'Design and implement data models (MDM hub and staging marts), ETL processes, and integration pipelines.', "Education: Bachelor's degree or 4 years of relevant experience in lieu of degreeExperience: Minimum of 4 years related experience", 'Some experience with REST and .NET preferred', 'Test new software products/updates; working with other members of the Master Data Management team and business partners to improve usability and recommend improvements.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Education: ', 'A strong, talented staff is at the heart of St. Luke’s Health System. We are the state’s largest employer with more than 13,500 employees and a medical staff of more than 1,800 physicians and advanced practice clinicians. Our employees are dedicated to impacting the lives of those in our community while pursuing a life- changing career at St. Luke’s. Our staff is the reason for our outstanding reputation as both a quality employer and superior healthcare organization. We’re proud of our people who deliver skilled, compassionate care every day, and are looking to add dedicated individuals who will continue in the same tradition of excellence.', 'Strong SQL experience, writing queries and stored procedures.Experience with database management systems including performance optimizing and tuning. Development experience with Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services.Exposure to basic data warehousing methodologiesSome experience with REST and .NET preferred', 'Build cross functional relationships with data analytic teams and business leaders to understand information needs, data flows, and data quality considerations to enable solution deployment.', 'Our employees enjoy many benefits, some of the most popular are\xa0tuition reimbursement, hospital retirement contributions, and hospital-supported on-going training and education.', 'Work with architects to implement solutions in alignment with standards.', '\xa0', 'Utilize data quality techniques for data validation, unit testing, and automated integration testing. Implement frameworks for automated and scripted testing.', 'If you’re looking for a place where you can grow in your personal life, in your career, and in your community, St. Luke’s may be just the place for you.', "Education: Bachelor's degree or 4 years of relevant experience in lieu of degree", 'Data Engineer – Intermediate to Advanced', 'As a key member of our Master Data Management team at St Luke’s, you will be integral in developing innovative data solutions for business-critical data that is shared across the enterprise and collectively represents a “single source of truth.” The ideal candidate for this position would have great communication skills, be a curious self-starter, have great analytical and problem-solving skills, and have a passion for delivering technical solutions that enable time-sensitive, critical decisions. In this role some experience with Profisee is preferred, but not required.', "\ufeffAbout St. Luke's:", 'Identify technical solutions that achieve efficiency and effectiveness and enable data usage as a strategic, business asset.', 'Exposure to basic data warehousing methodologies', 'Experience: Minimum of 4 years related experience', 'Required Criteria:', 'Contribute to improving solution stability, reliability, efficiency, and quality.', 'Experience:', 'With multiple locations in the beautiful southern and central Idaho, our mild, four season climate means you can play outdoors year-round. Whether you prefer leisurely walks along the river or heart-pounding climbs up a sheer cliff- there is always something to do after work. An exciting mix of urban and outdoor life defines Idaho’s culture, you can ski in the morning and watch a college sporting event at night. It is a great state to raise a family and forge lasting relationships. The cost of living is low, and quality of life is high.', "Do you like working on things that positively impact the health of your friends, family, neighbors, and community?\xa0St. Luke's is the region’s leading health system, locally owned and not-for-profit. One of just four U.S. health systems to achieve Magnet accreditation four times, we’re an attractive place to grow your career. Being ranked at the top is great validation for the work we do, but our friends and neighbors are the real winners."]

['', 'Will work with:', '401 (k)', 'MUST HAVES:', 'We believe healthcare should and can be better.\xa0With a single-minded focus on value, we combine people, process, culture and technology to drive real and lasting change.\xa0We partner with our clients to\xa0deliver\xa0data analytics and digital transformation strategies and\xa0solutions\xa0to\xa0make healthcare more proactive, higher quality and less expensive\xa0for everyone.', 'Evaluate the limitations of existing data sources and provide recommendations to address unmet data needs', 'The Data Engineer will develop and implement new data pipeline solutions to support business strategies thru value driven prioritization & alignment with senior leadership. ['As part of our Data Engineering team, you will work in cross-functional and Agile project teams consisting of Data Scientists, Machine Learning Engineers, other Data Engineers. ['', 'Overview:', 'Benefits:', 'Join a fast-growing company early, make a difference, and enjoy the journey!', 'Data Engineer', 'Lead our data operations with a thorough knowledge and understanding of relational databases, data structures, and the ability to cleanse, analyze, and connect data from multiple sources.Catalog Management: Develop and monitor utilities to ensure all supplier catalogs and items are accurate, up to date, and exposed to the correct customers; manage all functions of the product catalog, including initial upload, periodic updates, and troubleshooting any data quality issues.Design standardized and scalable processes to integrate text files in a variety of formats (CSV, pipe-delimited, fixed-width, etc.) into Salesforce.Execute daily operational activities related to EDI and other interface platforms including, mapping, operational monitoring, and error handling.Be the hands-on subject matter expert on data operations and data engineering within GraphiteRx.Evaluate existing and emerging technologies; select and implement the necessary data tools to do your job effectively and efficiently.', 'Design standardized and scalable processes to integrate text files in a variety of formats (CSV, pipe-delimited, fixed-width, etc.) into Salesforce.', 'Primary Responsibilities:', 'We are seeking a\xa0Data Engineer. You will also play an integral part on our long-term data strategy, including the design and implementation of a data warehouse for reporting and analytics. The ideal candidate is thoughtful, organized, efficient, and a flexible team player with excellent analytical, written, and verbal communication skills. Keen attention to detail, a deep intuition for designing efficient data pipelines, and anticipating key data issues are essential.', 'Competitive compensation, startup options, and a rich benefits package, which includes health, dental, vision, life insurance, 401k, a generous leave policy, and more.', 'Evaluate existing and emerging technologies; select and implement the necessary data tools to do your job effectively and efficiently.', 'GraphiteRx is a modern pharmacy marketplace platform that is transforming healthcare by reimagining how pharmacies and suppliers do business, together. We empower pharmaceutical suppliers to better serve customers by making it easier for pharmacies and clinics to procure medications in a more cost-effective manner. Our belief is simple. When we help pharmacies and suppliers win, patients and healthcare win too! GraphiteRx is located in Nashville, TN and is backed by Bowery Capital and lool Ventures.', 'Catalog Management: Develop and monitor utilities to ensure all supplier catalogs and items are accurate, up to date, and exposed to the correct customers; manage all functions of the product catalog, including initial upload, periodic updates, and troubleshooting any data quality issues.', 'GraphiteRx is committed to building a diverse and inclusive company that celebrates and develops individuals of all backgrounds. ['', 'PM20', "BioIntelliSense is ushering in a new era of continuous health monitoring and clinical intelligence for Remote Patient Monitoring (RPM) and Screening (COVID-19/Infection). Our medical-grade Data-as-a-Service (DaaS) platform seamlessly captures multi-parameter vital signs, physiological biometrics and symptomatic events through an effortless patient experience. The FDA-cleared BioSticker and BioButton devices make remote monitoring and early detection simple. Through the platform's advanced analytics, clinicians, patients, and employers will now have access to high-resolution patient trending and reporting to enable medical grade care at home, and medical grade screening in the office, school, or residence.", 'Duties:', '- Masters or Ph.D. helpful, but not required', 'Data Science Engineer', '- Running data science experiments at scale on Google Cloud infrastructure ', '- Mentoring junior members of team in technical areas', 'This is a unique opportunity to apply your experience, roll-up-your-sleeves and significantly contribute to the rapid development, growth and expansion of BioIntelliSense in delivering clinical intelligence, globally. ', ' sensor fusion algorithms', 'time-series sensor data', 'We are seeking a Data Science Engineer to help spearhead our catalogue of cloud-based BioSignatures for early detection and screening for various disease states and physiological deterioration.  ', 'Roles & Responsibilities:', '**BioIntelliSense is proud to be an equal opportunity employer.  All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, veteran, disability status or any other status protected under federal, state or local law.', '- Developing and reviewing system architecture to optimize the balance across cloud vs. edge processing. ', 'We are looking for top talent anywhere in the U.S.A, with a preference for the Denver, CO, or Northern California areas for a role that is work from home, with occasional travel to meet with the engineering team (once the pandemic is under control). ', '- BS in related field', 'The ideal candidate will have a mix of research with a solid track record of engineering execution with at least 7+ years of experience as a full-stack data scientist with Google Cloud or AWS expertise. Experience with time-series sensor data at scale along with sensor fusion algorithms background.', '- 7+ years of cloud-based data science or algorithm experience', '- Developing ML models from time-series sensor and bio-signal data', 'For more information on how BioIntelliSense is redefining remote patient monitoring through medical-grade and cost-effective data services, please contact us at info@biointellisense.com or visit our website at BioIntelliSense.com.', '- Being able to work under pressure in a startup environment', 'Minimum Experience, Skills, and Education:']

['', 'Design predictive models which grow and adapt as our products and customer base scale, utilizing machine learning, time-series and Bayesian statistics', 'Make rigorous statistical inferences from A/B testing on our product and customer segments', 'Passion to use all aspects of data science, programming, and technology to build the financial advisor of the future', 'Data Engineering and ETL experience is a big plus!', 'Knowledge of Looker or similar front end analytics platforms', 'MS in Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Physics, Engineering or a related field with 3+ years of experience', 'Comfort with distributed computing, specifically Pyspark, AWS EMR, and Airflow', 'Build and maintain scalable data systems and infrastructure that empower our marketing, product and business teams to make better decisions\xa0Design predictive models which grow and adapt as our products and customer base scale, utilizing machine learning, time-series and Bayesian statisticsWork with large datasets to help us better understand our customers and anticipate their needs through distributed computation techniquesMake rigorous statistical inferences from A/B testing on our product and customer segmentsNormalize our data across institutions and sources using semi-supervised learning', 'Stash is looking for a Data Scientist with a passion for building reliable, scalable, and performant data systems and software. We are a financial platform that makes it easy for anyone to start with as little as $5. At Stash, we are working toward a future where investors are as diverse as our world.\xa0']

plus', 'Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science or equivalent.', 'Track record of advancing new technologies to improve data quality and reliability', 'The Opportunity:', '4+ years development experience building and maintaining ETL pipelines', 'Personal Capital is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace dedicated to pursuing and hiring a diverse workforce.\xa0\xa0', 'Continuously improve quality, efficiency, and scalability of data pipelines\xa0', 'You are self-motivated, self-directed, and have hands-on experience with all aspects of the software development lifecycle, from design to deployment. You have a deep understanding of the full life data lifecycle and the role that high-quality data plays across applications, machine learning, business analytics, and reporting. Strong candidates will exhibit solid critical thinking skills, the ability to synthesize complex problems, and a talent for transforming data to create solutions that add value to a myriad of business requirements. You have the demonstrated ability to facilitate and take ownership of assigned technical projects in a fast-paced environment. Excellent written and speaking communication skills are required as we work together in a collaborative cross-functional environment and interact with the full spectrum of business divisions.', '3+ years of Python development experience', 'Experience with AWS integrations such as Kinesis, Firehose, Aurora Unload, Redshift, Spectrum, Elastic Mapreduce, SageMaker and Lambda', 'Personal Capital is a leading digital wealth management company, founded in 2009. We’re on a mission to transform financial lives through technology and people, providing both insight-driven advice with free financial tools and personalized wealth management from 200+ registered financial advisors across the country. Personal Capital has raised $315 million in capital from accomplished financial and strategic investors (IVP, Venrock, Crosslink, Corsair, Blackrock, BBVA, USAA, IGM/Power) to disrupt the traditional $30 trillion U.S. wealth management market. Our free personal finance app is utilized by over two million users, helping them track over $840 billion of their personal finances, all in one place. Our award-winning apps paved the way for our advisory firm, which now manages over $12 billion in personalized investment portfolios for American families. Personal Capital is headquartered in Redwood Shores with offices in San Francisco, Denver, Dallas and Atlanta.', 'The Candidate:', 'You will play a critical role on the Data and Analytics team, responsible for transforming data from disparate systems to provide insights and analytics for business stakeholders. You’ll leverage cloud-based infrastructure to implement technology solutions that are scalable, resilient, and efficient. You will collaborate with Data Engineers, Data Analysts, Data Scientists, DBAs, cross-functional teams, and business partners. You will architect, design, implement and operate data engineering solutions, using Agile methodology, that empower users to make informed business decisions.', 'The Company:', '\xa0', 'Experience with API code integrations with external vendors to push/pull data between organizations\xa0', 'At least 7 years of post-degree professional experience, including:', 'Qualifications:', 'Familiarity with data orchestration pipeline using Argo or Airflow', 'Knowledge of analytic tools such as R, Tableau, Plotly, Python Pandas', 'Proficiency with the design and execution of NoSQL database to optimize BigData storage and retrieval\xa0', 'Financial services industry experience is a plus', 'Deep understanding of writing test cases to ensure data quality, reliability and high level of confidence']

['', 'What You’ll Like About Us', 'You have a superior knowledge of statistical analysis methods, such as input selection, logistic and standard regression, etc.', 'We base our work on scientifically-proven, peer-reviewed methodologies that are designed by medical professionals.', 'You possess excellent SQL/relational algebra skills, ideally with at least a basic knowledge of how different types of databases (e.g.: column vs row storage) work.', ' We work on problems that affect the lives of real people. Our users depend on us to make positive changes to their health and their lives. We base our work on scientifically-proven, peer-reviewed methodologies that are designed by medical professionals. We are a data-driven company through and through. We’re a respectful, diverse, and dynamic environment in which Engineering is a first-class citizen, and where you’ll be able to work on a variety of interesting problems that affect the lives of real people. We offer a generous budget for personal development expenses like training courses, conferences, and books. You’ll get three weeks’ paid vacation and a flexible work policy that is remote- and family-friendly (about 50% of our engineering team is fully remote). We worry about results, not time spent in seats. ', 'You have 4+ years of experience as a Data Scientist or Data Analyst in a similarly-sized organization, with a proven record of analysis and research that positively impacts your team.', 'We offer a generous budget for personal development expenses like training courses, conferences, and books.', 'You are comfortable with at least “medium data” technologies and how to transcend the “memory bound” nature of most analytics tools.', 'We work on problems that affect the lives of real people. Our users depend on us to make positive changes to their health and their lives.', 'We’re a respectful, diverse, and dynamic environment in which Engineering is a first-class citizen, and where you’ll be able to work on a variety of interesting problems that affect the lives of real people.', 'You possess excellent communication skills and the ability to clearly communicate technical concepts to a non-technical audience', 'We are a data-driven company through and through.', 'You’ll get three weeks’ paid vacation and a flexible work policy that is remote- and family-friendly (about 50% of our engineering team is fully remote). We worry about results, not time spent in seats.', ' You have 4+ years of experience as a Data Scientist or Data Analyst in a similarly-sized organization, with a proven record of analysis and research that positively impacts your team. You possess excellent communication skills and the ability to clearly communicate technical concepts to a non-technical audience You possess excellent SQL/relational algebra skills, ideally with at least a basic knowledge of how different types of databases (e.g.: column vs row storage) work. You have a superior knowledge of statistical analysis methods, such as input selection, logistic and standard regression, etc. You are comfortable writing Python code, and have good working knowledge of pandas and numpy. We don’t expect you to write production-quality code, but you should have some programming experience. You are comfortable with at least “medium data” technologies and how to transcend the “memory bound” nature of most analytics tools.', 'What We’ll Like About You', 'You are comfortable writing Python code, and have good working knowledge of pandas and numpy. We don’t expect you to write production-quality code, but you should have some programming experience.']

['Use engineering best practices to ensure security and privacy compliance across all development projects.', 'Responsibilities', 'Job Title', "Bachelor's degree in technology related field or relevant experience4+ years of MS SQL or T-SQL experience, including writing, troubleshooting, optimizing, etc.4+ years of industry experience in Data Engineering, BI Engineer, or related field with experience manipulating, processing, and extracting value from large datasets4+ years of industry experience in Data Presentation & Visualization using PowerBI, Tableau, Reporting Services, or similar reporting softwareExperience with agile and scrum software development methodologiesHands-on experience with Azure Cloud Services (Data Factory, Data Explorer, HDInsight, Cosmos DB, SQL) or equivalentExperience with data warehouse technical architectures, ETL/ELT, and reporting/analytics toolsExperience optimizing code for hardened, efficient deployments", 'Experience optimizing code for hardened, efficient deployments', 'Hands-on experience with Azure Cloud Services (Data Factory, Data Explorer, HDInsight, Cosmos DB, SQL) or equivalent', 'Collaborate and communicate with architects and engineers to optimize data flows, tools, operational costs, and reporting infrastructures.', '4+ years of industry experience in Data Presentation & Visualization using PowerBI, Tableau, Reporting Services, or similar reporting software', '4+ years of MS SQL or T-SQL experience, including writing, troubleshooting, optimizing, etc.', 'Work with business stakeholders and Product team to understand requirements and translate to technical requirements.', 'Mentor and develop other team members.', 'Help design, architect, and support high quality data frameworks.', 'The Senior Data Engineer is a member of an Agile-oriented team of software engineers, business analysts, software testers, technical writers and UX designers who leverage software to solve real-world problems in the event planning industry. The Senior Data Engineer actively develops new reports for stakeholders and maintains existing reports with a high degree of quality and attention to detail. They build and maintains ETL processes and build data structures and warehouses to accommodate data needs for the company.  The Senior Data Engineer works with business and product analysts to determine reporting requirements and how to best to derive the intended outcome; with architecture to inform data frameworks, including accuracy of data, performance, and scaling; with dev team to determine inclusion of reporting technical requirements; with quality assurance to ensure reports are accurate and representative of stakeholder requirements.', 'Job Overview', 'Experience with agile and scrum software development methodologies', 'Senior Data Engineer', 'Help build data marts for different use cases across the business, using Microsoft and other big data technologies.', 'Work with business stakeholders and Product team to understand requirements and translate to technical requirements.Build and maintain reports on existing reporting infrastructure (PowerBI, Tableau), while helping evolve solution based on stakeholder needs.Help design, architect, and support high quality data frameworks.Collaborate and communicate with architects and engineers to optimize data flows, tools, operational costs, and reporting infrastructures.Use engineering best practices to ensure security and privacy compliance across all development projects.Help build data marts for different use cases across the business, using Microsoft and other big data technologies.Mentor and develop other team members.', 'Requirements', 'Experience with data warehouse technical architectures, ETL/ELT, and reporting/analytics tools', 'Build and maintain reports on existing reporting infrastructure (PowerBI, Tableau), while helping evolve solution based on stakeholder needs.', "Bachelor's degree in technology related field or relevant experience", '4+ years of industry experience in Data Engineering, BI Engineer, or related field with experience manipulating, processing, and extracting value from large datasets']

Develop standards, processes and procedures that align with best practices in data governance & data management.  Understand logical and physical data modeling, load and query performance. Create and manage ETL packages, triggers, stored procedures, views, and SQL transactions. Develop new secure data feeds with external parties as well as internal applications.  Perform regular analysis and QA, diagnose ETL and database related issues, perform root cause analysis, and recommend corrective actions to management. Work with the project team to support the design, development, implementation, monitoring, and maintenance of new ETL programs. Coach and mentor other data engineers as needed. ', 'Understand logical and physical data modeling, load and query performance.', 'You are a problem solver and like getting your hands dirty with the details of a gnarly problem.']

['', '· Experience using statistical computer languages (R, Python, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets.', 'o Coding knowledge and experience with several languages: C, C++, Java, JavaScript, etc.', 'o Experience with distributed data/computing tools', '· Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy.', '· Strong problem-solving skills', 'TRADOC Deputy Chief of Staff for Intelligence (G-2)’s mission is to understand, visualize, describe, deliver & assess the OE in order to reduce risk and prevent surprise; today and into the future 2035+. TRADOC G-2 is the designated Lead for Core Function #13 Operational Environment; the process of developing, verifying, validating, accrediting, and providing OE products and services represents an authoritative, validated OE contextual baseline for TRADOC users and operational forces in the areas of training and training development; education; leader development; concept and doctrine development; and capabilities development, integration, and evaluation.', 'Verifiable, active SECRET security clearance (or the ability and willingness to quickly obtain one)', 'Looking for candidates from Virginia or Noth Carolina.', '· 5 years of experience manipulating data sets and building statistical models', '· Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks.', '· Mine and analyze data from existing databases to drive decision making.', '· Use predictive modeling.', 'o Knowledge and experience in statistical and data mining techniques: GLM/Regression, Random Forest, Boosting, Trees, text mining, social network analysis, etc.', '· Develop custom data models and algorithms to apply to data sets.', '· Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques.', '· Excellent written and verbal communication skills for coordinating across teams.', '· Coordinate with different functional teams to implement models and monitor outcomes.', 'o Experience querying databases and using statistical computer languages: R, Python, etc.', 'o Experience visualizing/presenting data for stakeholders', 'Morton is seeking a highly qualified Technical PD – Data Scientist to provide professional services and support for a key client working with the TRADOC Deputy Chief of Staff for Intelligence (G-2) Operational Environment (OE) and Core Functions. The Operational Environment (OE) is a composite of the conditions, circumstances, and influences that affect the employment of military forces and bear on the decisions of the unit commander. As an organic, complex system, the OE provides the common framework in which warfighting programs and strategies are conceived, defined, and executed. It is a living foundation in which choices made, by adversary and allies alike, affect the outcome of the future which must be accounted for. As adversary’s asymmetrical approach to warfare continues to generate greater complexity and flexibility, the government’s requirement for similar complexity and adaptability in Tactics, Techniques and Procedures (TTPs) escalates correspondingly.', '· Work with Government stakeholders to identify opportunities for leveraging data to drive data driven decision making.', '· A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques', '· Must be a U.S. citizen', '· Verifiable, active SECRET security clearance (or the ability and willingness to quickly obtain one)', 'Specific duties may include, but are not limited to:', '· Work with large data sets to better understand the changing worldwide geopolitical and tactical level military landscape. Use a variety of data mining/data analysis methods and data tools to build and implement models, using/creating algorithms and creating/running simulations.', '· Familiar with the following software/tools:', '· Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests and proper usage, etc.) and experience with applications.', 'o Experience creating and using advanced machine learning algorithms and statistics: regression, simulation, scenario analysis, modeling, clustering, decision trees, neural networks, etc.', 'Required Qualifications:', '· Bachelor’s Degree', '· Experience working with and creating data architectures.', '· Excellent organizational skills']

['Required:', 'Desired:', 'About Genesis10:', 'BA/BS Degree preferredExperience with the Go programming languageExperience with Google Cloud Platform, AWS, Azure, or a similar cloud provider.Experience with Ansible, Chef, Puppet, Terraform', 'Experience with Ansible, Chef, Puppet, Terraform', 'Experience with the Go programming language', 'Top 3 Daily Responsibilities:', 'Summary:', 'Genesis10 is seeking a Software Engineer for a 6 month contract position with our client in the SEO industry located in Seattle, WA.Summary:Cloud Platform allows developers to build, host, store and deploy applications or websites on highly-scalable and reliable infrastructure for web mobile and backend solutions.Overall Responsibilities:As part of this role you will build systems and solutions on top of both in-house and open source tooling (Kubernetes, Terraform) that enable Cloud customers configure and deploy their infrastructure, including compute, storage and network architecture, application security, identity and access management resources, logging and monitoring componentsTop 3 Daily Responsibilities:', 'Experience with Google Cloud Platform, AWS, Azure, or a similar cloud provider.', 'Genesis10 is seeking a Software Engineer for a 6 month contract position with our client in the SEO industry located in Seattle, WA.', 'Any particular programs/tools background: preferred skills: Kubernetes, Google Cloud Platform, Terraform', '# of years of minimum experience: 3Any particular programs/tools background: preferred skills: Kubernetes, Google Cloud Platform, TerraformAble to work as a W2 employee of Genesis10 (no corp to corp)', 'Overall Responsibilities:', 'If you have the described qualifications and are interested in this exciting opportunity, apply today!About Genesis10:Genesis10 is a leading U.S. business and technology consulting firm with hundreds of clients needing proven talent and solutions to power their strategic initiatives. If you are a high performing business or IT professional with solid, referenced experience, we want to meet you. Genesis10 recruiters and delivery professionals are highly accomplished career advocates, who get to know you beyond your resume to position you with the opportunities that fit your skills, experience and aspirations. We have benefit options to fit your needs and a support staff that works with you from placement throughout your engagement  project after project. To learn more about Genesis10 and to view all our available career opportunities, please visit us at www.genesis10.com  "Genesis10 is an Equal Opportunity Employer, M/F/D/V', 'Author code and configuration, primarily to interface with HTTP APIsBuild test cases to set up Cloud Platform resourcesGeneric troubleshooting and possible bug fixes for the tooling', 'Build test cases to set up Cloud Platform resources', 'If you have the described qualifications and are interested in this exciting opportunity, apply today!', 'BA/BS Degree preferred', 'Author code and configuration, primarily to interface with HTTP APIs', '# of years of minimum experience: 3', 'Generic troubleshooting and possible bug fixes for the tooling', 'Able to work as a W2 employee of Genesis10 (no corp to corp)']

['', 'Title:\xa0Staff Software Engineer - Platform/Shared Services', 'Cleo is a\xa0family benefits platform that picks up where the healthcare system leaves off. We combine the expertise of our team of guides and specialists\xa0– parent and maternity coaches, doulas, lactation consultants, sleep experts, and more! – with a powerful technology platform that helps every working parent succeed as they grow both their families and their careers.', 'Collaborate cross-functionally with design, data scientists, business users, project managers and other engineers', 'Core Tech Stack:', 'Excellent and pragmatic testing practices', 'If you believe you can make an impact on our mission, we want you!', 'Own impactful features from design through to deploymentDesign and implement complex technical solutionsLead the engineering team in best practices for implementation, testing, deployment, and maintenanceEvaluate multiple software vendors and solutions to recommend the best approach for our teamsCollaborate cross-functionally with design, data scientists, business users, project managers and other engineers', '7+ years of software engineering experience', 'Title:', 'About Cleo:\xa0', 'Skill at partnering cross-functionally across the organization\xa0', 'An eagerness to work in an ever-changing, fast-paced startup environment', 'To be successful in this role you may have:', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Evaluate multiple software vendors and solutions to recommend the best approach for our teams', 'Engineering at Cleo:', 'NodeJS/NestJS', 'Python/Django', 'Python/DjangoNodeJS/NestJSReact NativePostgreSQL', 'Own impactful features from design through to deployment', 'Lead the engineering team in best practices for implementation, testing, deployment, and maintenance', 'Experience with deployment pipelines and various approaches to microservices', 'At Cleo, we make a real impact by doing work that matters: helping families be their best at home and at work.', "As a Staff Software Engineer on the Platform team, you'll be working on building our core shared services used between our guides and our families. You will be responsible for designing and leading the implementation for our messaging system, session scheduling service, and more. Under your leadership, the team will be responsible for end-to-end ownership of these services from design through deployment and support.\xa0We work closely with Design, Product Managers, QA, and Data Science to create the best solutions for our customers. We have a strong team culture and each engineer supports the learning and growth of everyone through brown bags, pairing, and tech huddles, resulting in the entire team's growth and potential.\xa0", 'Offered by over 100 leading employers, including global Fortune 500 leaders and industry innovators like Box, Chegg, Niantic, and Zenefits, and backed by NEA, Greylock and Felicis, we’re expanding our offerings and our team to meet the growing demand of employers, parents, and the healthcare sector and are looking for experienced and passionate team members like you to join us!', 'React Native', 'We don’t believe in perfection – we believe in passion, interest, and will – so don’t let a lack of experience or skill in one area listed above deter you from applying.', 'Design and implement complex technical solutions', 'Cleo is proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, transgender status, sexual stereotypes, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.', 'Deep knowledge in ES6 javascript, React/React Native, and NodeJS', 'Hands on production level experience with Postgres', '7+ years of software engineering experienceHands on production level experience with PostgresDeep knowledge in ES6 javascript, React/React Native, and NodeJSExcellent and pragmatic testing practicesExperience with deployment pipelines and various approaches to microservicesProven track record of team leadership and mentorshipSkill at partnering cross-functionally across the organization\xa0An eagerness to work in an ever-changing, fast-paced startup environment', 'Proven track record of team leadership and mentorship', 'PostgreSQL']

['', 'Have experience building software solutions for customer needs', 'Our data science team takes ideas from inception to new machine learning-powered features that ship to our hundreds of thousands of users. You’ll be central to creating features that help our customers learn and grow from their data. For this role, we’re looking for people who are first and foremost software engineers with an interest in data science.', 'Design and implement systems that run correctly, securely and reliably at scale.', 'Be full stack, owning front-end and back-end projects.', 'Technologies we use (not comprehensive!):', 'HTML, JavaScript, React', 'Numpy, Scipy, Pandas', 'Have experience implementing machine learning models, data pipelines and testing frameworks for research and production use.', 'Python', 'Understand how to profile code and optimize performance.', 'Who You Are:', 'Klaviyo is the world’s leading owned marketing platform known for accelerating revenue for online businesses using the channels they own like email, web, and mobile. Enabling companies to leverage these owned marketing channels, Klaviyo makes it easy to store, access, analyze and use transactional and behavioral data to power highly-targeted customer and prospect communications. And unlike other marketing platforms, Klaviyo doesn’t force companies to compromise between advanced functionality or ease of use - so companies of all sizes are able to maximize their sales quickly. ['', 'Website - https://www.pacteraedge.com/', 'The ideal candidate will meet the following: ', 'software engineer', 'About Pactera EDGE - Pactera EDGE is a global organization with offices in the US, Europe, India, and Asia-Pacific.\xa0Clients include 100+ of the Global 500 companies, with industry concentration in Software and Technology, CPG, Retail, Logistics, Financial Services, Insurance, Healthcare, Food & Beverage, and Travel & Hospitality.', '- BA/BS degree in Computer Science or related discipline preferred', '.Net, C#, SQL and Windows', 'We’re looking for a strong and passionate software engineer with a strong background in system design, implementation, testing, and monitoring product development lifecycle. ['', 'Experience with distributed computing systems', 'power', '\u200b\u200b7+ years of experience as a software engineer', 'Work with our sales team and lead client demos', 'Define and document implementation steps for ingestion from data pipelines such as Kafka, data warehouses such as S3, or change data capture feeds such as Golden Gate', 'Industry analysts predict that within 10 years, 4 out of 5 decisions will be machine assisted. job_title: Software Engineer in Test - Computational Biology
job_text: ['', 'What You Will Be Doing', ' BS/MS in computer science, bioinformatics, computational biology, or equivalent. Good knowledge of Python, Bash, Linux, and Git. Experience in designing and developing validation, verification, and regression tests. 2+ years bioinformatics development/testing or equivalent is highly desirable. Experience in bioinformatics applications and DNA sequencing is highly desirable. Experience with continuous integration systems (Jenkins, Travis) is highly desirable. Experience with image processing tools (e.g. OpenCV) and algorithms are highly desirable. Experience in JavaScript is a plus. Experience with issue tracking systems (Jira) is a plus. Experience in Go, Rust, and/or R is a plus. Experience with Amazon Web Services and/or VMWare is a plus. ', '2+ years bioinformatics development/testing or equivalent is highly desirable.', 'Work with software engineers and computational biologists to develop tests, define test metrics and troubleshoot/resolve issues.', 'Experience with continuous integration systems (Jenkins, Travis) is highly desirable.', 'Report test issues and results in a consistent and timely manner.', 'About The Role', 'Experience with Amazon Web Services and/or VMWare is a plus.', 'Experience in Go, Rust, and/or R is a plus.', 'Support troubleshooting of customer issues.', 'Experience with image processing tools (e.g. OpenCV) and algorithms are highly desirable.', 'Plan design, develop, and automate test plans against software releases.', 'TO BE SUCCESSFUL IN THIS ROLE, YOU MUST HAVE ', 'Experience with issue tracking systems (Jira) is a plus.', 'Experience in JavaScript is a plus.', 'Experience in bioinformatics applications and DNA sequencing is highly desirable.', 'Good knowledge of Python, Bash, Linux, and Git.', 'Experience in designing and developing validation, verification, and regression tests.', ' Plan design, develop, and automate test plans against software releases. Work with software engineers and computational biologists to develop tests, define test metrics and troubleshoot/resolve issues. Report test issues and results in a consistent and timely manner. Support troubleshooting of customer issues. Test installations over a range of operating systems. ', 'ABOUT 10x GENOMICS', 'Test installations over a range of operating systems.', 'BS/MS in computer science, bioinformatics, computational biology, or equivalent.', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, sex, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, or on the basis of disability.']

where employment is based upon personal capabilities and qualifications. HPOne does not discriminate because of actual or perceived sex, sexual orientation or preference, gender identity, gender, transgender, race, color, religion, national origin, creed, citizenship status, ancestry, age, marital status, pregnancy, childbirth or related medical conditions, medical conditions including genetic characteristics, mental or physical disability, military and veteran status, or any other protected characteristic as established by law.\xa0HPOne requires the necessary drug testing and background checks as part of our pre-employment practices.', 'Self-motivated and creative', 'Develop application code and modules for business and technical requirements', 'What you’ll be responsible for:', 'Work well in a team-oriented environment, helping others to succeed', 'Troubleshoot, debug and maintain web and batch applications', 'Performs other related duties as assigned.', 'Understand complex issues and solve problems', 'We are seeking a Software Engineer to join our team.\xa0As a Software Engineer, you will play a key role in the modernization of HPOne’s online and backend platforms using .NET technologies. You will continuously improve the platform by implementing enhancements as well as new features based on requirements and priorities as determined by the business.', 'Software Engineer', 'Web mobile technology development', "Founded in 2006, HPOne is a leading sales and marketing organization that operates across multiple segments of the Medicare and health insurance marketplaces. Using proprietary technology solutions coupled with deep industry knowledge, the company provides a range of outsourced sales, marketing and contact services for national and regional health plans, operates private exchanges for individual consumers and employer-based group retirees, and manages the largest exclusive Medicare lead generation marketplace in the industry.\xa0HPOne’s core differentiation is its exclusive focus on the health insurance industry, bringing innovative and performance-based solutions that address the most pressing challenges facing clients. With four state-of-the-art contact centers around the country and a management team with an average of over 15 years in the health insurance industry, HPOne provides its clients with the solutions they need to profitably grow and manage their business.\xa0For five consecutive years, HPOne has been named to Deloitte's Technology Fast 500™, a ranking of the 500 fastest growing technology, media, telecommunications, life sciences and energy tech companies in North America, earning a rank of 357 for 2016.", 'Translate business users’ requirements into actionable specifications', 'Ability to excel in fast-paced, demanding environment', 'Preferred Skills/Abilities:', 'Must be detailed-oriented, motivated, self-starter, with excellent time management and organization skills']

['', 'Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Information Management, Systems Engineering or equivalent field of study', 'Optimizes statistical efficiency and data quality in close collaboration with the production teams.', 'Provides the data analysis and be a key participant in the manufacturing problem solving process to ensure a fact based and data driven Root Cause analysis and Counter Measure identification.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Develops and implements data collection systems', 'Exciting opportunity to work for a global leader in the medical diagnostic manufacturing industry!\xa0We have an immediate opening for an experienced Process Data Scientist to join our growing team here in Branchburg, NJ.\xa0The Process Data Scientist provides data science support for Operations and turns data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions in close collaboration with Production Specialists. Use of experience, analytic approach and know how is crucial for identifying process improvements to ensure a stable manufacturing yield of our Manufacturing facilities. Identifies, analyzes, and interprets trends and patterns in complex data sets. Key contributor in solving manufacturing problems and providing data analysis to make fact-based decisions. Works in a dynamic environment providing process improvements for Manufacturing Operations.', 'Education:\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', "Develops and implements data collection systemsDevelops and monitor KPI's to support the production teams to strategically steer and continuously improve quality improvement initiatives.Optimizes statistical efficiency and data quality in close collaboration with the production teams.Acquires data from primary or secondary data sources and maintain databases/data systemsIdentifies, analyzes, and interprets trends or patterns in complex data sets to improve yield for production processes.Provides the data analysis and be a key participant in the manufacturing problem solving process to ensure a fact based and data driven Root Cause analysis and Counter Measure identification.Willingness to learn manufacturing technologies in a regulated production/operations environment.Other duties as assigned by management.", 'Acquires data from primary or secondary data sources and maintain databases/data systems', 'Identifies, analyzes, and interprets trends or patterns in complex data sets to improve yield for production processes.', 'Willingness to learn manufacturing technologies in a regulated production/operations environment.', "Develops and monitor KPI's to support the production teams to strategically steer and continuously improve quality improvement initiatives.", 'Other duties as assigned by management.', '\xa0', 'MS SQL, Python, Tableau, R, Statistical knowledge. ['', 'Preferred Qualifications: ', 'This position is responsible for business consulting activities for the Analytics Competency Center within various business units as the primary interface and as a liaison to Information Technology in order to: Serve as an expert in translating complex data into key strategy insights and valuable actions. Perform data exploration and data mining. Create business intelligence, dashboards, visualizations, and/or other advanced analytics reports to adequately tell the business narrative and offer recommendations that are practiced, actionable, and have material impact, in addition to being well-supported by analytical models and data.\xa0', "Required Qualifications: Master's degree in business analytics or an advanced computer programming field, statistics, physics, mathematics, engineering, computer science, management of information systems, or related fields or an MBA. Work experience in addition to degree: 10+ years. Licenses, certifications or registrations: Certified Analytics Professional (CAP) from INFORMS. ", 'Contract to hire (12 months before conversion)', 'Job-specific knowledge, skills or abilities: Working knowledge of statistics, programming and predictive modeling. Working knowledge of code writing. Previous experience working in data mining or natural language processing. Possess advanced statistics/machine learning knowledge and implementation skills.\xa0', 'Preferred Qualifications: Strong critical thinking skills and the ability to relate them to the products or services the company is producing. Understanding of and ability to use programming languages like Python and SQL (Structured Query Language). Strong knowledge of basic and advanced prediction models. Data mining knowledge that spans a range of disciplines. Strong exploratory analysis skills. Excellent verbal and written communication skills as well as the ability to bridge the gap between data science and business management. Exceptional organizational skills and is detail oriented. Mastery of statistics, machine learning, algorithms and advanced mathematics.\xa0', 'Required Qualifications: ', 'No C2C', 'Job-specific knowledge, skills or abilities: ', 'Must be able to convert to a full time employee without sponsorship']

['', 'In detail you will:', 'As a Software Engineer for Applications, you are responsible for building customer-facing cross-platform native apps for the direct control of autonomous robot on mobile devices such as tablet and smart remote controllers. You will build responsive apps and features for\xa0Auterion Mission Control\xa0which since built on top of QGroundControl, means your contributions will ultimately end up in the open source community.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with Auterion and community developers in an agile software development workflow and participate in dev calls, forums and meetings.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Be responsible for holding the highest bar for the entire software life cycle, from strategic planning to tactical activities, to execution and implementing solutions for customers and follow the principles of Test Driven Development and always have cybersecurity in mind.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Build and maintain features, improvements and software architectures that support a large native application with a mix of UI/UX and non-visible components to it.', 'Senior Applications Software Engineer (US Remote) with a high emphasis on UI/UX', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You have a positive and self-motivating attitude, high self-\xadawareness and a desire to continually improve.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Fundamental concepts and algorithms from a Computer Science degree (or relevant) or equivalent years of working experience and 4+ years of professional working experience with any statically typed programming language (C, C++, C#, Java, or similar), previous exposure to Javascript or QML is advantageous\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Willingness to learn C++, Javascript, qt and QML\xa0', 'At Auterion we are on a mission to power any drone, anywhere, whilst shaping the future of drone operations at scale. We enable this by building the operating system for safe, reliable and efficient drone missions. Our comprehensive\xa0enterprise software\xa0is developed on top of the most widely used open-source flight controller for drones - PX4 - and it includes the ground station as well as the cloud tools to manage and monitor the drone fleet. We take great pride in using a community-powered approach as we continue to offer trusted software and services to our customers.\xa0', 'git', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Interact with on-board system to control and consume advanced behavior, complex missions, different type of video feeds and real time radio systems.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Deep affinity for elegant and lightweight user experiences that provide a maximum impact with minimum burden', 'This role could be located in Zurich Switzerland or in the US, prefer Mid-West/East Coast locations to accomodate time differecnes between Zurich and US for collaboration. Auterion offers an excellent benefits package including flexible working hours, a generous vacation plan, pension fund plan with company matching, benefits contributions, and annual learning and development opportunities to widen your horizon. Furthermore, we offer a competitive salary, stock options, and career growth opportunities', '\xa0customer-focused', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Build the app on the QT stack using C++ and Javascript (QML) but also interact with Java and other native platform (macOS, Linux, Windows, Android, iOS) build tools (gcc, gdb, llvm, lldb, make, cmake, etc).', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You’re\xa0customer-focused\xa0and understand that shipping impactful software involves trade offs and collaboration.', 'We are a fast-growing global tech startup, with well-funded investment from the same visionary investors who have supported companies such as Airbnb, Facebook, Skype, and Spotify. Our growing client base covers prestigious and innovative partners such as GE Aviation, DIU, Impossible Aerospace and many more.', 'Auterion Mission Control', 'We’d love to hear from you if:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Manage your day-to-day development activity with\xa0git\xa0and champion easy-to-read and easy-to-maintain git histories consisting of small, well-commented commits.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop incredible user experience to expedite complex command and controls of flying drones.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with architecture and developing complex, greenfield, mobile/native apps ideally in a lean environment', 'enterprise software', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience building and debugging complex systems in a team environment', 'What you’ll find at Auterion:\xa0']

['', ' Constant improvement. If your processes have a way to improve themselves, you\'ll never be stuck in a rut. We hold retros, and we value and protect the ability of any team member to say, "This can and should be better." We value experimentation, especially when coupled with measurement. Balance. We\'re a collaborative team. We kick ideas around. The more viewpoints we have, the more likely we are to hear a good idea we haven\'t thought of. We all have the opportunity to work on all parts of the system. No one is stuck working on the legacy systems full time. Working to live, not living to work. We take our work seriously. We strive to make the best software we can for our clients. But we know that "release death marches" are not the way to achieve this. Software is a marathon, not a sprint. ['', 'We look at Descartes Labs as a work environment where people are included, treat their colleagues with professional regard and respect, and thrive as a result', 'Your contributions will span many layers, from high-performance virtual file systems and cloud infrastructure, to API endpoints and pragmatic client libraries. job_title: Lead Data Scientist & Analytics Engineer Job
job_text: ['', ' Create tools for automated domain-specific template driven configuration and deployment of analytics pipelines at scale ', ' 8+ years of experience in building Analytics solutions ', ' 5+ years of experience in building and operationalizing analytics pipelines and services adopting container ecosystem of Docker, Kubernetes. ', 'Responsibilities', ' Accommodation for Applicants with Disabilities: ', ' Attention to detail and commitment to delivering high quality services ', ' Excellent problem solving, critical thinking, and communication skills ', ' 3+ years’ experience using one or more of the following: TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, SparkML, etc. ', 'Qualifications', '  Leverage multiple real-time telemetry, batch and master data sources to design, test, optimize and deploy end-to-end pipelines for large-scale continuous ML workloads and the exploitation of the ML and data science models in analytics and prediction workloads and microservices   Write scalable, distributed and highly efficient code with demonstrated proficiency in programming in one or more languages such as Scala, Python, Java and other coding languages; proficiency in exploiting distributed and concurrent computing frameworks such as Akka, Spark and Kafka   Create tools for automated domain-specific template driven configuration and deployment of analytics pipelines at scale   Create templates for containerization and cloud deployment using Azure, Docker, Kubernetes containerization or similar   Mentor junior analytics engineers and collaborate with peer teams across the organization.  ', ' MS or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or related field, or equivalent professional experience ', ' Initiative and passion for finding solutions to hard problems at scale and operationalizing them ', ' Demonstrated ability to work in ambiguous situations and across organizational boundaries. ', ' Create templates for containerization and cloud deployment using Azure, Docker, Kubernetes containerization or similar ', ' 5+ years of demonstrated AI/ML and Deep Learning development in production pipelines with relevant code experience ', ' Mentor junior analytics engineers and collaborate with peer teams across the organization. ', ' Write scalable, distributed and highly efficient code with demonstrated proficiency in programming in one or more languages such as Scala, Python, Java and other coding languages; proficiency in exploiting distributed and concurrent computing frameworks such as Akka, Spark and Kafka ', 'We invite you to apply today to join us as We Light the Way to a Brilliant, Productive, and Connected World!', '  MS or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or related field, or equivalent professional experience   8+ years of experience in building Analytics solutions   5+ years of experience in building and operationalizing analytics pipelines and services adopting container ecosystem of Docker, Kubernetes.   5+ years of demonstrated AI/ML and Deep Learning development in production pipelines with relevant code experience   3+ years’ experience using one or more of the following: TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, SparkML, etc.   5+ years’ experience using one or more of the following: Spark, Spark (structured) Streaming, Akka, Kafka, etc.   Experience working in a data intensive environment and translating business needs into data requirements   Excellent problem solving, critical thinking, and communication skills   Attention to detail and commitment to delivering high quality services   Initiative and passion for finding solutions to hard problems at scale and operationalizing them   Demonstrated ability to work in ambiguous situations and across organizational boundaries.   Respect, Accountability, Integrity and a Positive Can-Do attitude  ', ' 5+ years’ experience using one or more of the following: Spark, Spark (structured) Streaming, Akka, Kafka, etc. ', 'We Light the Way!', ' Leverage multiple real-time telemetry, batch and master data sources to design, test, optimize and deploy end-to-end pipelines for large-scale continuous ML workloads and the exploitation of the ML and data science models in analytics and prediction workloads and microservices ', ' Experience working in a data intensive environment and translating business needs into data requirements ', ' Respect, Accountability, Integrity and a Positive Can-Do attitude ']

['', 'Desired Experience', 'We are seeking someone who wants to be a contributor in a small, dynamic work environment, loves a challenge, and has a strong balance of technical and people skills. As a Data Engineer you will be a member of our backend engineering team and collaborate to help specify, design, and develop data pipelines meeting company and product requirements. You will help evaluate and choose service protocols and architectures, write high quality, maintainable code in a fast-paced startup environment with tight schedules, and be fully responsible for ensuring quality and proper deployment of the written software.', 'Expertise in SQL-like languages and tools', 'Responsibilities', 'Work with business stakeholders and product managers to define ETL pipeline requirements', 'Build, maintain, and document automated ETL pipelines', 'Work with business stakeholders and product managers to define ETL pipeline requirementsDesign data schemas to efficiently stores data that support various BI reporting needsBuild, maintain, and document automated ETL pipelinesContinuously monitor and optimize the pipelines and data schemasBuild automated alerting to improve efficiency of our team’s operations, including but not limited to time series forecasting, anomaly detection, text classifications, etc.', 'Continuously monitor and optimize the pipelines and data schemas', '3+ years of proven success working in backend of large-scale software developmentBS/MS in Computer Science or related fieldExpertise in SQL-like languages and toolsAbility to learn quickly and display solid analytical/engineering thinkingExperience in building scalable and distributed ETL pipelines for analytics processes and/or training machine learning modelsAble to design and develop quality cloud-based systems and operate them in an automated fashionDemonstrable experience in taking projects from spec to releaseWorking knowledge of Druid, Fivetran, Redshift, Looker, Spark, Luigi/Airflow, etc.', '3+ years of proven success working in backend of large-scale software development', 'About mParticle', 'Ability to learn quickly and display solid analytical/engineering thinking', 'Design data schemas to efficiently stores data that support various BI reporting needs', 'Employment opportunities are available to all applicants without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'BS/MS in Computer Science or related field', 'Able to design and develop quality cloud-based systems and operate them in an automated fashion', 'Founded in 2013, mParticle is the leading customer data platform that unlocks the full power of data for businesses. The company empowers brands to accelerate their growth strategy to keep pace with their customers by providing the most advanced data platform for web and apps across all devices in the marketplace. A trusted partner among renowned brands such as Airbnb, Foursquare, Hulu, King, and Spotify among many others, the mParticle platform has grown to manage over 1 billion mobile users each month, capturing over $5 billion in ecommerce transactions and processes over 250 billion API calls. Recognized as one of Crain’s 100 Best Places to Work in New York City and named to Gartner’s “Cool Vendors in Mobile App Development” list, mParticle has 45 employees and is headquartered in New York City with offices in San Francisco, Florida, Seattle and London.', '*At this time, mParticle is unable to sponsor visas for this role, unfortunately.', 'Here at mParticle we embrace the differences that make us unique. We are dedicated to building an inclusive environment that fosters respect and celebrates an array of backgrounds and perspectives.', 'Demonstrable experience in taking projects from spec to release', "We're looking for a talented and technically well-rounded person who loves to tackle complex problems and is passionate about building scalable and reliable data pipelines that serve as foundations to various applications, e.g., BI reporting, data transformations/integrations, machine learning, etc.", 'Here at mParticle, everyone is equal. We\xa0believe strongly in our values\xa0and are looking for someone who demonstrates empathy and sincerity to all roles and teammates. Our clients include marketing and engineering functions for some of the largest apps in the world and our platform processes nearly one-third of the world’s smartphone traffic.', 'Working knowledge of Druid, Fivetran, Redshift, Looker, Spark, Luigi/Airflow, etc.', 'Experience in building scalable and distributed ETL pipelines for analytics processes and/or training machine learning models', 'Build automated alerting to improve efficiency of our team’s operations, including but not limited to time series forecasting, anomaly detection, text classifications, etc.']

['', 'Knowledge of web-based security protocols & frameworks.', 'Knowledge of threat modeling frameworks.', '5+ years experience in web application security', 'Coda is looking for a talented security engineering expert who is passionate about protecting customer data, setting company wide policies, finding practical solutions to difficult problems, and helping make your fellow employees successful. If you have experience in information security, threat modeling, authentication & authorization frameworks, and best-practice security operations, we want to talk with you. This is the first dedicated security hire for us and we intend for you to grow into a leadership position over time as the team expands.', '5+ years experience in web application securityKnowledge of web-based security protocols & frameworks.Knowledge of network security, authentication, and cryptography.Knowledge of threat modeling frameworks.Knowledge of AWS infrastructure with a particular focus on security (IAM, Role-based security, etc.)', 'Establish best-practice security policies across the company; including threat modeling & security-focused code reviews.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Occasionally travel to meet with peer teams and business stakeholders.', 'Design, implement, and support security-focused software to address a variety of business challenges.Excel in a dynamic environment with the ability to multitask and work not only on projects, but also provide operational support.Establish best-practice security policies across the company; including threat modeling & security-focused code reviews.Manage our public bug bounty program.Manage contracts with third party software vendors, including a regular third-party pen-test process.Work proficiently with minimal daily mentorship and bring mature seasoned skills when working with production systems.Build and maintain detailed and accurate documentation.Occasionally travel to meet with peer teams and business stakeholders.', 'Build and maintain detailed and accurate documentation.', 'Manage our public bug bounty program.', 'Knowledge of AWS infrastructure with a particular focus on security (IAM, Role-based security, etc.)', 'Knowledge of network security, authentication, and cryptography.', 'Skills:', 'Excel in a dynamic environment with the ability to multitask and work not only on projects, but also provide operational support.', '\xa0', 'Manage contracts with third party software vendors, including a regular third-party pen-test process.', 'Design, implement, and support security-focused software to address a variety of business challenges.', "Documents and spreadsheets have remained relatively unchanged for the last 40 years and yet these paradigms still largely dominate how businesses and people operate.\xa0We're taking a fresh approach and empowering anyone to start with something as simple as a document and easily involve this into a powerful, connected application. We believe this will be game-changing and influence the paradigms of the next 40 years.", 'Work proficiently with minimal daily mentorship and bring mature seasoned skills when working with production systems.']

['', 'Semi-remote work option available once on-prem work resumes. ', 'About the Senior Back End Engineer role:', 'Requirements:', 'Responsibilities', 'Define and create architecture for new features.', 'About Scorpion:', 'Temporarily remote-based.Semi-remote work option available once on-prem work resumes. Competitive pay.100% of medical, dental, and vision covered.\xa0Traditional and Roth 401(k).Paid-time off.The icing on the cake: an amazingly friendly and family-oriented culture.', 'Perks & benefits:', 'As a Senior Back End Engineer on our Engineering Team, you will be responsible for the architecture and development of database application solutions and their integration with front-end applications. You will design, code, test, debug, document, and support the things that you build, and own the back-end code for new software projects for existing and upcoming platforms. You’ll define the architecture for new features, and collaborate closely with different teams to ensure quality and execution.\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'The icing on the cake', 'Collaborate on solution architecture for new and existing platforms.', 'Build out database application solutions and their integration with front-end applications using SQL and C#.', '6+ years of software development experience with an emphasis on C#, SQL, .NET (ASP.NET, and/or .NET Core 2+).', '100% of medical, dental, and vision covered.\xa0', 'Work with hosting vendors to ensure the performant functioning of hosting platforms.', 'Knowledge of test-driven development (TDD), Git repository, and SOLID principles, behavior-driven development (BDD), and their application to code.', 'Scorpion is a full-service digital marketing & technology company that works hard to help our clients realize their goals and accomplish their vision. We partner with law firms, home services businesses, franchises, and healthcare organizations to deliver an experience unlike any other. Our services include website design, search engine optimization (SEO), pay-per-click (PPC) advertising, video advertising, online reputation management, social media marketing services, and branding/UX services. As of 2020, we have the honor of being named to the Inc. 5,000 list of fastest-growing private companies in America for the 10th year in a row.\xa0', 'Competitive pay.', 'Paid-time off.', 'Interact with CMS & API partners to ensure stability and performance.', 'Traditional and Roth 401(k).', 'Experience with Object-Oriented Analysis (OOA), Object-Oriented Design (OOD), and Object-Oriented Programming (OOP).', 'The icing on the cake: an amazingly friendly and family-oriented culture.', 'Experience with Azure/Azure DevOps is a plus!', '6+ years of software development experience with an emphasis on C#, SQL, .NET (ASP.NET, and/or .NET Core 2+).Knowledge of RESTful architectures.Knowledge of test-driven development (TDD), Git repository, and SOLID principles, behavior-driven development (BDD), and their application to code.Experience with Object-Oriented Analysis (OOA), Object-Oriented Design (OOD), and Object-Oriented Programming (OOP).Experience with Azure/Azure DevOps is a plus!', 'Knowledge of RESTful architectures.', 'Temporarily remote-based.', 'Build out database application solutions and their integration with front-end applications using SQL and C#.Define and create architecture for new features.Work with hosting vendors to ensure the performant functioning of hosting platforms.Interact with CMS & API partners to ensure stability and performance.Collaborate on solution architecture for new and existing platforms.']

['', 'You are a creative thinker, not bound by "the way things have always been done". What you know is less important than how well you learn and innovate. We don\'t need engineers who know all the answers; we need engineers who can invent the answers no one has thought of yet, to the questions yet to be asked. ', 'You value, seek out, and foster diversity. We are a global team from many diverse backgrounds, with different experiences and perspectives. To complement this team, you will welcome ideas that are different from your own and be skilled at finding and building from common ground. ', 'Who We Are Looking For:', 'You have a product-focused mindset. ['', ' Architecting powerful yet seamless end-to-end user products to keep Airbnb community safe Building a long-term technology stack with well defined APIs that is service-oriented, modular, granular, observable, and efficient Incorporating scalable, real-time risk detection into Airbnb services Working with cross-functional teams with design, product, data science, and research partners to drive engineering decisions ', ' Create products to deter and defend against account fraud with more secure yet seamless ways of onboarding and authentication like using biometrics, Web Authentication, and passwordless methods with one time code login. Our work has had a major impact in increasing signup/login success rates, revenue, and reducing account takeovers. Re-architect the authentication backend with well-designed abstractions as the ways to onboard and authenticate expands, and maintain high systems quality including latency, reliability, and availability. Revamp the signup/login logging and metrics, one of the key Airbnb business indicators, to incorporate new signals for how users interact at the top of the funnel so we can more effectively and accurately identify ways to improve our onboarding user journey. Improve the experience of account management, such as end-to-end API redesigns of the account settings page and reset password flow, as well as the user education process during onboarding. Work on a company wide initiative across teams to incorporate signup during the booking checkout flow to reduce the number of steps new users need for booking.
